item.title: Whatever happened to .... the 12-year-old Ukrainian girl in need of a heart transplant?
item.description: During a Russian attack, a medical team drove to extract the heart of a young girl who'd just died and bring it to their hospital, where a 12-year-old was in desperate need of a transplant.
